personal_data.institution: Central Institution - Indonesian Ministry of Higher Education, Science, and Technology

strong_points: Problem solver, accustomed to logical and critical thinking.
Willing to work hard, but on the other hand always thinking to find more efficient ways.
Enjoys reading and learning new things/topics/knowledge.
Good at analysis and strategic planning.
Has good communication and persuasion skills.
weak_points: Avoids problems, but tends to fight/rebel when feeling intimidated.
Tends to be lazy when there are many accumulated and overlapping tasks.
Doesn't like to order/command/ask for help from others.
